items.title: Fall Prime Day price still live on Samsung’s 2025 37-inch Odyssey G7 165Hz 4K UHD curved gaming monitor at $250 off
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Samsung that drops its latest 37-inch Odyssey G7 165Hz 4K gaming monitor down to $649.99 shipped. This particular display debuted a couple of months back carrying a $900 price tag, and it’s now seeing a $250 discount. It dropped to the $700 mark at Amazon ahead of the fall Prime Day sale, but it’s now fetching $50 less than that price to land at the lowest price we’ve tracked for it to date. You can also score the larger 40-inch Odyssey G7 for $799.99 shipped, down from its regular $1,200 price tag. Head below for more details.

items.title: Get reliable stain-fighting support with Shark’s StainStriker portable cleaner at $105 (Reg. $140)
items.summary:
If you missed out on picking up a portable deep cleaner during Prime Day, Amazon is offering a great chance to make up for that fumble with the Shark StainStriker Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner at $104.99 shipped. Normally fetching $140 these days at full price, Tuesday and Wednesday’s Prime savings saw the price taken down to the $100 low, with it promptly ending along with the event. If you missed that low price, you can still pick it up at the next-best rate for just $5 more, equipping your home with a cleaner I think everyone should have at the ready.
